fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert a target's role into a random Town of Salem role with the same Alignment and Sub-alignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evil Faction members just get their Abilities, Attributes, Attack and Defense changed to the ones of a random TOS Mafia/Coven.

- You will be notified if you convert a Evil Faction member.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good Faction lose, You dont need to be alive.
